About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Allan Jones (Aj) is a designer/developer based out of North Dallas (McKinney) who thrives on learning and enhancing the craft of design in all its forms. When he's away from his desk, he loves to take his talents to the kitchen, photography and shooting hoops.

Warrantech

Graphic/Web Designer

Design and develop branding, print and digital materials for Fortune 500 consumer products and automotive companies.

One Community Church

Web/App Specialist

Update and maintain with weekly website/mobile app management of multiple-location church.

Society of Petroleum Engineers

Graphic Designer

Produced designs for annual meetings and internal marketing materials. Developed and maintained monthly magazine publications for print, web and digital format that circulate to 120,000 global members.
